messages.name: AuthenticationError
messages.description: Informs that the requester is not an authenticated user.
messages.template: Access to requested resource${args[0] != null ? " '${args[0]}'" : ""} requires an authenticated user.

args.name: resourceName
args.description: The name of the resource being accessed.

messages.name: AuthorizationError
messages.description: Informs that the authenticated user is not authorized for the requested resource access.
messages.template: User '${args[0]}'is not authorized to access resource '${args[2]}' of type '${args[1]}'.

args.name: userId
args.description: The Jali UserId of the authenticated user.

args.name: claimType
args.description: The type of the required claim.

args.name: claimValue
args.description: The value of the required claim.
